title: Noam Chomsky on Palestine, Haiti, media - Toronto, 1996
description:
Barrie Zwicker interviewing Noam Chomsky for Vision TV,  1996.

0:00 "the news media are profoundly reactionary"
13:38 Haiti - Aristide and the coup
36:14 Middle East - media coverage in the US
48:12 "intellectual self defense"
51:20 disinformation
55:00 seen any movies lately
57:15 B roll

Home transfer from VHS original.
